H0.text: Bacteria are the type of microorganisms that spread to cause the skin disease impetigo.

H1.text: Viruses are the type of microorganisms that cause the skin disease impetigo by spreading.

H2.text: Tumors are the type of microorganism that spreads to cause the skin disease impetigo.

H3.text: Algae are the type of microorganism that cause the spread of the skin disease impetigo.

A4.text: S. aureus can cause a range of illnesses, from minor skin infections, such as pimples, impetigo, boils, cellulitis, folliculitis, carbuncles, scalded skin syndrome, and abscesses
